insert.addCreation: INSERT INTO vg_creations (name, short_description, long_description, creation_type, user_id, date_added, used_materials, image_ids) VALUES (:name, :shortDescription, :longDescription, :creationType, :userId, :dateAdded, :usedMaterials, :imageIds)
insert.addMetaToCreation: INSERT INTO vg_creations_meta (creation_id, meta_key, meta_value) VALUES (:creationId, :metaKey, :metaValue)

select.lastCreations: SELECT name, short_description as shortDescription, c.id as id, displayed_name as author, u.id as authorId, used_materials as usedMaterials, image_ids as imageIds FROM vg_creations c JOIN vg_users u ON c.user_id=u.id
select.lastUserCreations: SELECT name, short_description as shortDescription, used_materials as usedMaterials, image_ids as imageIds, c.id as id FROM vg_creations c JOIN vg_users u ON c.user_id=u.id WHERE u.id = :userId
select.allUserCreationsNameShortDescDateTypeId: SELECT name, short_description as shortDescription, date_added as dateAdded, creation_type as creationType, used_materials as usedMaterials, image_ids as imageIds, c.id as id FROM vg_creations c JOIN vg_users u ON c.user_id=u.id WHERE u.id = :userId
select.creationInfo: SELECT name, short_description as shortDescription, long_description as longDescription, creation_type as creationType, used_materials as usedMaterials, image_ids as imageIds, c.id as id, displayed_name as author, u.id as authorId FROM vg_creations c JOIN vg_users u ON c.user_id=u.id WHERE c.id = :id
select.creationAuthorId: SELECT user_id FROM vg_creations WHERE id = :id

update.name: UPDATE vg_creations SET name = :name WHERE id = :id
update.shortDescription: UPDATE vg_creations SET short_description = :shortDescription WHERE id = :id
update.longDescription: UPDATE vg_creations SET long_description = :longDescription WHERE id = :id
update.creationType: UPDATE vg_creations SET creation_type = :creationType WHERE id = :id
update.imagesIds: UPDATE vg_creations SET image_ids = :imagesIds WHERE id = :id
update.usedMaterials: UPDATE vg_creations SET used_materials = :usedMaterials WHERE id = :id

insert.addUser: INSERT INTO vg_users (username, email, passwd, displayed_name) VALUES (:username,:email,:passwd, :displayed_name)
insert.personalUserInfo: INSERT INTO vg_users_personal_info (user_id, first_name, last_name, birthday_date, city, country) VALUES (:userId, :firstName, :lastName, :birthdayDate, :city, :country)

select.passwordFromLogin: SELECT passwd FROM vg_users WHERE username=:username OR email = :email
select.passwordFromUsername: SELECT passwd FROM vg_users WHERE username=:username
select.basicInfosFromId: SELECT id, username, displayed_name as displayedName, is_admin as isAdmin, is_super_admin as isSuperAdmin FROM vg_users u WHERE u.id=:id
select.allUsersBasicInfos: SELECT id, username, email FROM vg_users
select.idFromLogin: SELECT id FROM vg_users WHERE username=:username OR email = :email

select.selectImageInfo: SELECT file_name as fileName, upload_date as uploadDate, server_file_name as serverFileName FROM vg_uploaded_files WHERE id = :id

file.uploadFile: INSERT INTO vg_uploaded_files (file_name, server_file_name, mime, upload_date, user_id) VALUES (:file_name, :server_file_name, :mime, :upload_date, :user_id)
